title: Importance of Sports
content: How are sports going to contribute to my resume and/or placements given if I put my effort into research and DSA....

comments.body:
Does not effect directly but holds a lot of importance during interviews.
The interview read my resume and saw that I was in the cricket team, we spoke a good 15 mins about my journey, what it thought my etc 
So Iâ€™d say it matters but not everywhere
